thread.title: Thousands of Students Protest Rising Tuition Fees in South Africa
thread.title_full: Thousands of Students Protest Rising Tuition Fees in South Africa - WSJ

author: Patrick McGroarty
title: Thousands of Students Protest Rising Tuition Fees in South Africa
text:
PRETORIA, South Africa—Thousands of students angry over rising university fees protested outside the president’s office on Friday, some clashing with police, in the most direct challenge to the ruling African National Congress since the end of white-majority rule 21 years ago.
Protests have hit more than a dozen campuses across the country this month, as students balk at proposed increases they say would put higher education out of... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
